ComicInfo.Summary:
THE MANY LOVES OF CONAN!
There have been many loves of Conan's life beyond ale and battle.
But nothing is sacred as the CRIMSON WITCH twists what is truly best in life!
PLUS: The next chapter in the all-new CONAN novella "BLACK STARLIGHT"!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Esad Ribic | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Nick Bradshaw & Rachelle Rosenberg | 2 | Var | Hidden Gem Variant Cover | John Buscema | 3 | Var | Marvels 25th Anniversary Tribute Variant Cover | Carlos Pacheco, Aneke & Dean White | 4 | Note: Includes a novella back-up, Black Starlight Part 7 of 12, written by John C. Hocking.
